General.Name: Klassik Radio AG
General.Description: Klassik Radio AG operates radio broadcasting stations primarily in Germany. It operates in two segments, Radio Stations and Merchandising. The company distributes advertising forms in radio and entertainment news. It provides digital advertising-financed free channels, such as klassik am morgen, feel good klassik, classic, movie heroes, film classics, new classics, wine evening, classic for cooking, baroque, mozart, bach, beethoven, verdi, piano, opera, classic for children, rock, lounge beat, schiller lounge, the till brönner shoe, smooth jazz, and other channels. The company was formerly known as Klassik AG and changed its name to Klassik Radio AG in 2004. Klassik Radio AG was founded in 1986 and is based in Augsburg, Germany.
